content: size 1 2 3 4 head circumference 46-50 50-54 55-58 59-63 cm width 21 23 26 28 cm length 21 22 24 26 cm gauge 16m x 24p = 10 x 10 cm yarn kos 62% alpaca 29% nylon og 9% wool 50 grams = 150 meters quantity ca 27 29 33 36 grams yardage ca 81 87 99 108 meters needle size 5 5 mm us 9 40 cm circular needles 5 5 mm us 9 double pointed needles or 80 cm cirucular needle if you knit with the magic loop technique alternative yarns you can knit the beanie in several different yarns as long as the gauge remains the same the look may vary from yarn to yarn so you can easily pick the look you want
